# Python 数据科学和机器学习实践指南（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/python-shuju-kexue-he-jiqi-xuexi-shijian-zhinan-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/python-shuju-kexue-he-jiqi-xuexi-shijian-zhinan-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install python-shuju-kexue-he-jiqi-xuexi-shijian-zhinan-chuyi
python-shuju-kexue-he-jiqi-xuexi-shijian-zhinan-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g python-shuju-kexue-he-jiqi-xuexi-shijian-zhinan-chuyi
python-shuju-kexue-he-jiqi-xuexi-shijian-zhinan-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
